item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello everyone üòÖ My name is Catherine. And here are a few facts about me: I have been programming for 8 years, since my second year of college I worked for a year as a teacher of professional disciplines (incl. JavaScript) combined with studying at the university In my spare time, I solve tasks on CodeWars (max kata: 3 kyu) When performing tasks, I look for effective solutions and systematize everything I love writing and formatting text!

item.title: Projects
item.description: 2022 Personal data repository (Mar - Apr `22) Grocery delivery service (May `22 - now) 2021 School of Studio Oleg Ch. (May `21) Split the bill (thesis project) (Dec - Jun `21) The social network (Aug - Sep `21) Store for technology and electronics (Dec - Jan `21) and ect. School of Studio Oleg Ch.
